title: Four Charts Show A Flattening Recovery

title: Expanding U.S.-China Decoupling Beyond Economic Relations Will Only Hurt U.S.
text: As Trump realizes what was once his only talking point for conquering the country’s toughest economic challenge—taming and decoupling from China—rings hollow, he is doubling down and pursuing an even more expansive forced U.S.-China decoupling: in foreign policy.

title: 2020 Year of Crisis: Markets Melt Up
text:
Bloomberg Special Report 2020 Year of Crisis: Markets Melt Up
Covid-19 has ravaged the economy and with people stuck at home retail investors are turning to the market in a big way.

title: After monster rally, investors cautious as U.S. recovery wobbles

title: Gold At $1,900 Signals A Decades Long, Economy Sapping Devaluation Of The Dollar
text: No one earns dollars; rather they earn what dollars can be exchanged for. To pretend as so many economist do that currency devaluation boosts growth is to pretend that we're made better off when monetary authorities shrink the value of what we earn.

title: Fitch revises the U.S. outlook to negative, affirms AAA
text: CNBC's Sara Eisen reports Fitch Ratings has affirmed that the U.S.'s outlook from stable to negative due to the ongoing deterioration in the U.S. public finances and absence of a 'credible fiscal consolidation plan.'

title: Ignore GDP Plunging 33%. Pay Attention To The 9.5% Decline.

title: OPEC July oil output surges as Gulf voluntary cuts end: survey

title: Gold to Hit $2200-$2300 Range on Inventory Squeeze, Says UBP’s Kinsella
